metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12581 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in js/designer/move.js in phpMyAdmin before 4.8.2.A Cross-Site Scripting vulnerability has been found where an attacker canuse a crafted database name to trigger an XSS attack when that database isreferenced from the Designer feature.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
